Bellevue, WA - ONSITE Senior Ruby on Rails Software Engineer

We are searching for a talented Senior Ruby on Rails Software Engineer to help expand and maintain our award-winning product. This is a unique position for an experienced, passionate, motivated and productive coder seeking new challenges in a fast-moving organization, who is leading a revolution in the world of high-tech, adaptive learning technologies. Our engineers are top-notch software developers who love listening to our customers, working as a team, and proactively taking the lead whenever necessary.

Our ideal candidate is a creative problem-solver. We want someone who is collaborative and wants to be part of a team that works and plays well together. We have established highly functioning Scrum/Agile teams and you should have previous experience working in an Agile environment. You will own and be accountable for technical initiatives around core Ruby on Rails services and underlying technology platform, and as such, you will be able to develop a solid reputation and trust among your peers as a go-to expert on Ruby. As part of the team, you will participate in interviewing and hiring more great people like you. You will work on hard problems at scale and will have autonomy to deliver.

View the complete job description and apply online at http://bit.ly/21kcAHl.
